name: Dookie(not cookie)Clicker
description:
Please feel free to donate. I spent many hours editing and sharing these games, and I would really appreciate the support.

pro tip:

click

___________________________________________

You click the poop in the middle of the screen to earn poop. With the poop you can buy upgrades for click power and poop per second.

Your goal is to get as many poop as you can.
